definition: to tremble/to shiver/to shake/to vibrate/Taiwan pr. [zhan4]
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The slats of the blind could be seen to tremble at every shot.
sentences.chinese: 她每打一槍，就可以看到百葉簾在顫動。

sentences.english: He steps up onto the chair. It wobbles queasily.
sentences.chinese: 他站到椅子上，椅子被踩地顫動起來。

sentences.english: He in whose chant all your singing is but a soundless throbbing.
sentences.chinese: 在他的詠唱裏，你的歌聲只是無聲的顫動。

sentences.english: Warfarin is the better choice in the anticoagulative treatment of atrial fibrillation.
sentences.chinese: 而華法令是目前心房顫動抗凝較好的選擇。

sentences.english: Objective To ascertain the relevance of KCNE1 gene and lone atrial fibrillation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討KCNE1基因與孤立性心房顫動的關係。

sentences.english: The ground quaked under his feet .
The attack of AF has its fundamental cause and trigger.
sentences.chinese: 心房顫動的發生常有其基礎病因和促發因素。

sentences.english: Each star in Orion seemed to tremble and stir with my breath.
sentences.chinese: 獵戶星座裏的每一顆星星似乎都因了我的呼吸而顫動。

sentences.english: His mouth was working away when he was speaking.
sentences.chinese: 他說話時嘴在不斷地顫動。

sentences.english: The bridge trembled as the train went over it.
sentences.chinese: 當火車從橋上開過時，橋身隨之顫動起來。

sentences.english: The sign on the wall seemed to quaver under a film of sliding warm water.
sentences.chinese: 牆上的招牌好象在一層浮動的融融的水流下顫動。

sentences.english: We all felt the earthquake tremors.
sentences.chinese: 我們都感覺到了地震時的顫動。

sentences.english: After five more his muscles stopped quivering.
sentences.chinese: 在砸了第六下後，他的肌肉停止了顫動。

sentences.english: Dai Lin lips live fibrillation, did not know is because of angry or sad.
sentences.chinese: 戴琳雙脣不住的顫動，不知是因爲氣憤還是傷心。

sentences.english: Focal atrial fibrillation treated by circumferential radiofrequency catheter ablation of pulmonary vein orifice.
sentences.chinese: 導管射頻肺靜脈口環狀消融治療局竈性心房顫動。

definition: variant of 戰慄|战栗[zhan4 li4]
to tremble/to shiver/to shake/to vibrate/Taiwan pr. [zhan4]
to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
